turned consultant Peter Dix answers your questions Q We are hearing a lot about academies and free schools. What are they and what is the difference? A Technically, there is no difference. These new schools will become academies, wrote Michael Gove , the Education Secretary, when he launched the free schools programme in the autumn. But in practical terms, academies are existing schools that change their status to receive funding directly from central Michael Government, but
